content: skills level intermediate enjoy making this super easy pine tree materials - 2 00 mm hook - yarn green and brown - polyester fiberfill - tapestry needle the pine tree measures approximately 11 cm tall when using the materials mentioned above if you are using yarn with a different gauge the toy s measurements will change feel free to use any yarn you want the toy itself won t change just the size make sure you sew tightly every part of the toy abbreviations us terms st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase decrease decrease
